alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 7:09PM MST until February 17 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing and localized drifting snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...Until 5 PM Friday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow will result in areas with slick roads, and possibly localized drifting of snow on the road. Motorists should use extreme caution as roads will be good for awhile, but become extremely hazardous quickly. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The impact will be roads in rural areas. This includes Highway 287, 789 in southeast Fremont County. In Natrona County, this includes Interstate 25, Highway 20,26 and Highway 259.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
